MemoryInfobox.description: 'Thespis' Xerxes actor|villain was nowhere to be found. Had he fallen into a worse predicament than those he'd portrayed on stage?'

General_Description: '''The Curse of Fame''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s [[Genetic memory|genetic memories]], relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the [[Animus|Portable Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: [[Thespis]] tasked Kassandra with finding [[Xerxes actor|the actor]] who was to play the role of [[Xerxes I of Persia|Xerxes I]] in his latest play.
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra found the actor and untied him.
*'''"Xerxes":''' ''Thank the gods!''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Don't thank them yet. Let's get out of here.''
She escorted the actor away from the ruins.
*'''"Xerxes":''' ''Thank you! I don't think I could have survived much longer.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Why were those ''malákas'' ''keeping you prisoner?
*'''"Xerxes":''' ''They were raving, convinced I'm the villains I play. They wanted me to lead them in a dark ceremony and tortured me to recite their spells... Nothing was enough.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You're safe now.''
*'''"Xerxes":''' '' I am, but the witch has plans to harm the [[Civilian|citizens]] of [[Elis]]. She says they wronged her, so she poisoned a shipment of supplies for the city!''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll have to destroy those supplies before they get there.''
*'''"Xerxes":''' ''But now that she knows you're here, she'll leave her hiding place and flee into the wilderness! No one will be safe if she escapes.''

<tabber>
|-| I'll destroy the Poisoned supplies.=
Kassandra destroyed the supplies.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I destroyed the poisoned supplies before they could reach Elis.''
*'''"Xerxes":''' ''That's good, but the witch is still out there. Nobody really safe... I'm not safe.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You think Xerxes was ever safe? [[Leonidas I of Sparta|Leonidas]] and his [[Sparta]]ns wanted him dead. {{Wiki|Atossa|His own mother}} would betray him given the chance.''
*'''"Xerxes":''' '' Xerxes asking for safety... You're right, the King of [[Iran|Persia]] would never grovel. He'd crush his enemies before they could execute their plans.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm glad you see it that way. You should get back to Thespis.''
*'''"Xerxes":''' ''I will, and thank you. Xerxes will rule at last!''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Happy to have helped, your majesty.''
|-| I'll kill the witch before she escapes.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I can't let that witch escape. Who knows what she'll do next?''
Kassandra headed back into the ruins, where she engaged the witch in combat.
*'''Witch:''' ''I'll drink your blood from your scull! You'll be gone to [[Underworld|Hades]] soon!''
Despite her boasting, the witch proved no match for Kassandra and was killed.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''That witch is dead, thank [[Jupiter|Zeus.]]''
With the witch taken care of, Kassandra returned to "Xerxes".
*'''Kassandra:''' ''That horrible witch won't hurt anyone ever again.''
*'''"Xerxes":''' ''Oh, thank you! That delusional hag turned her followers against me. But now that she's dead, I should be fine. Right?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You'll be fine. You should go on and play your part knowing Xerxes is safe.''
*'''"Xerxes":''' ''You're right, Xerxes was sure of himself. A god among men! I should be as confident as him.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm glad you see it that way. You should get back to Thespis.''
*'''"Xerxes":''' ''I will, and thank you. Xerxes will rule at last!
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Happy to have helped, your majesty.''
</tabber>
Section_Outcome: Kassandra secured Xerxes for the play, while also stopping a threat to the city.
